comment: I took technical communications online and mccool was horrible the first week you have to rewrite a paper that counts as 25% of your grade. he provided very little instruction. the class is simple and I learned nothing at all. besides the paper all you do is a 150 discussion each week after reading a chapter from a novel.

An absolutely amazing class. This is one of those rare opportunities in college to learn practical real life skills. The class is very enjoyable. The style of teaching and the challenge of the assignments are perfect.

Easily one of the best professors I've ever had! He's very clear and concise with his requirements. He's also an all-around cool guy to be around. I wish I was required to take more of his classes...definitely an EASY A.

Easy class, just do your reading each week for discussion just a chapter a week, for each reading have to write less than 250 words, research paper at the end of semester with presentation, great class you will learn

McCool is cool - had to say it! If you follow his directions, you will do fine. One chapter to read each week and write a 1/2-page essay, possibly a quiz on the chapters, but otherwise no tests. One research paper to write and also present. Fairly easy class. He's a great teacher!
One of the nicest profs I've had, and he seem extremely intelligent. Talks a lot about neuroscience, language, and culture. Definitely recommend!!!

Cool guy. easy class. 1 paper, thats it! easy A. really laid back class. Dosnt require a book! he puts it on pdf on overhead. If you need a break, definitely take him! You will learn about presenting if you pay attention as well

very easy. He makes it seem hard, but it actually is VERY laid back. He requires the book, but it was not used, so if you can borrow (do so). Only needed to write a couple short essays and a big paper at the end. Recommended!
He is wicked smart and very funny!!
this guy expects you to do the work but he's reasonable...you'll definitely learn something here
supposed to be an easy A but not with this teacher take someone else
This prof makes research interesting. He has alot of research experience and is excited about the class. The final paper (research prospectus) is kind of hard.
This prof is an excellent instructor. His class is difficult but he's always available for help. The final paper is tough but you get the whole semester to work on it.
This guy is terrible. his assignments are  incomprehensible. he made us edit his personal book! t-com is already a useless class and I shouldn't have had to drop it. For the love of ___ take logan
easy man.  did very little until the end of the semester paper.  i suggest starting early
